data.text: @SenatorSlotkin What’s the penalty for an ex cia to use color revolution tactics she learned in the cia against her own government..? strongly worded letter maybe..?  Or..?
@SenatorSlotkin You called for a military coup.  Scumbag

@SenatorSlotkin I hope you feel the same when your in front of a military tribunal for your seditious behavior.  I bet you'll get singing a very different toon and Norm Esien won't ge there to help you because he'll be in the same hot seat. The clock is ticking!

@SenatorSlotkin Hey Senator, your people in Michigan want you to cosponsor the Save America Act. We know you won’t because you prefer cheating. But I’m putting it on record that your constituents want election integrity and you don’t listen to us. Taxation without representation. You failed us.
@SenatorSlotkin So you are above the law?  Interesting.
@SenatorSlotkin Stupid decisions/ stunts...have repercussions!!  Treasonous traitor.
